title: Downloader not processing cached blocks
body:
There seem to still be an issue/race somewhere in the downloader, which rarely occurs with the new integrated processing in that the block processing is not invoked/reinvoked.

Yesterday's dump showed a single goroutine in the downlaoder, everything else idling:

```
goroutine 217280 [select]:
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader.(*Downloader).fetchBlocks(0xc21c121180, 0x0, 0x0)
        /work/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader/downloader.go:492 +0x15c3
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader.(*Downloader).syncWithPeer(0xc21c121180, 0xc226b3fc00, 0xf165a9915567873e, 0x3b232e27eed29568, 0x46c49ff5e97ab6a0, 0xb884fc8db24741ea, 0x0, 0x0)
        /work/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader/downloader.go:297 +0x2b2
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader.(*Downloader).synchronise(0xc21c121180, 0xc21cecfc50, 0x10, 0xf165a9915567873e, 0x3b232e27eed29568, 0x46c49ff5e97ab6a0, 0xb884fc8db24741ea, 0x0, 0x0)
        /work/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader/downloader.go:270 +0x5c1
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader.(*Downloader).Synchronise(0xc21c121180, 0xc21cecfc50, 0x10, 0xf165a9915567873e, 0x3b232e27eed29568, 0x46c49ff5e97ab6a0, 0xb884fc8db24741ea)
        /work/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader/downloader.go:208 +0x1e2
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth.(*ProtocolManager).synchronise(0xc21c125040, 0xc21cec3380)
        /work/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/sync.go:159 +0xda
created by github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth.(*ProtocolManager).syncer
        /work/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/sync.go:140 +0x1f1
```

Today I made a similar dump:

```
goroutine 4913 [select]:
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader.(*Downloader).fetchBlocks(0xc220d2afc0, 0x0, 0x0)
        /work/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader/downloader.go:492 +0x15c3
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader.(*Downloader).syncWithPeer(0xc220d2afc0, 0xc22103fb90, 0xef7390ec19a8ad3d, 0x2f42ba04f3c8d036, 0x37b67f68b03385a4, 0xcd3e20c1847fd44e, 0x0, 0x0)
        /work/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader/downloader.go:297 +0x2b2
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader.(*Downloader).synchronise(0xc220d2afc0, 0xc2212170c0, 0x10, 0xef7390ec19a8ad3d, 0x2f42ba04f3c8d036, 0x37b67f68b03385a4, 0xcd3e20c1847fd44e, 0x0, 0x0)
        /work/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader/downloader.go:270 +0x5c1
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader.(*Downloader).Synchronise(0xc220d2afc0, 0xc2212170c0, 0x10, 0xef7390ec19a8ad3d, 0x2f42ba04f3c8d036, 0x37b67f68b03385a4, 0xcd3e20c1847fd44e)
        /work/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader/downloader.go:208 +0x1e2
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth.(*ProtocolManager).synchronise(0xc21f60a0d0, 0xc21ed7fc70)
        /work/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/sync.go:159 +0xda
created by github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth.(*ProtocolManager).importBlock
        /work/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/handler.go:399 +0x107a
```

In both scenarios the import cache was empty, while the download cache was full. Today:

``` javascript
> admin.progress()
{
  cached: 1024,
  estimate: '0',
  importing: 0,
  pending: 2582
}
```
